data.title: The Holocaust in Estonia: Einsatzgruppen, German occupation of Estonia during World War II, Reichskommissariat Ostland, Martin Sandberger

data.text:
The Holocaust in Estonia

Source

Print on Demand

Taschenbuch. Condition: Neu. This item is printed on demand - it takes 3-4 days longer - Neuware -Source: Wikipedia. Pages: 73. Chapters: Aleksander Laak, Einsatzgruppen, Einsatzkommando, Estonian Security Police and SD, Evald Mikson, Generalplan Ost, German occupation of Estonia during World War II, Hans Aumeier, Holocaust trials in Soviet Estonia, Kalevi-Liiva, Karl Jäger, Karl Linnas, Martin Sandberger, Omakaitse, Reichskommissariat Ostland, Rudolf Batz, Rudolf Joachim Seck, Sonderaktion 1005, Zelig Kalmanovich.
